qoute: A woman watches her body uneasily, as though it were an unreliable ally in the battle for love.
The body is a community made up of its innumerable cells or inhabitants.
A body of water occupying about two-thirds of a world made for man, who has no gills.
A caricature is putting the face of a joke on the body of a truth.
A constant smirk upon the face, and a whiffing activity of the body, are strong indications of futility.
A garden must be looked into, and dressed as the body.
A hairy body, and arms stiff with bristles, give promise of a manly soul.
A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
A woman watches her body uneasily, as though it were an unreliable ally in the battle for love.
The body is a community made up of its innumerable cells or inhabitants.
A body of water occupying about two-thirds of a world made for man, who has no gills.
A caricature is putting the face of a joke on the body of a truth.
A constant smirk upon the face, and a whiffing activity of the body, are strong indications of futility.
A garden must be looked into, and dressed as the body.
A hairy body, and arms stiff with bristles, give promise of a manly soul.
A house is not a home unless it contains food and fire for the mind as well as the body.
A room without books is like a body without a soul.
A sensual and intemperate youth translates into an old worn-out body.
Age wrinkles the body. Quitting wrinkles the soul.
All are but parts of one stupendous whole, Whose body Nature is, and God the soul.
All this sensory input, which begins in the brain, has its effect throughout the body.
An angel is a spiritual creature created by God without a body for the service of Christendom and the church.
An effeminate education weakens both the mind and the body.
An empty house is like a stray dog or a body from which life has departed.
As the ostrich when pursued hideth his head, but forgetteth his body; so the fears of a coward expose him to danger.
Begin to see yourself as a soul with a body rather than a body with a soul.
Belief like any other moving body follows the path of least resistance.
Body and spirit are twins: God only knows which is which.
Brevity is the body and soul of wit.
Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees.
Cheerfulness is the best promoter of health and is as friendly to the mind as to the body.
Clogged with yesterday's excess, the body drags the mind down with it.
Conscience is the voice of the soul; the passions of the body.
Courage conquers all things: it even gives strength to the body.
Cultivation to the mind is as necessary as food to the body.
Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
Disease is an experience of a so-called mortal mind. It is fear made manifest on the body.
Disease is not of the body but of the place.
Even as the cell is the unit of the organic body, so the family is the unit of society.
Facts are to the mind what food is to the body.
Games lubricate the body and the mind.
Gracefulness is to the body what understanding is to the mind.
Happiness is not being pained in body or troubled in mind.
Hate is always a clash between our spirit and someone else's body.
Health of body and mind is a great blessing, if we can bear it.
I am a typed director. If I made Cinderella, the audience would immediately be looking for a body in the coach.
I have a woman's body and a child's emotions.
I speak two languages, Body and English.
I won vice president of my student body in high school. That doesn't mean anything.
I've had so much plastic surgery, when I die they will donate my body to Tupperware.
Idleness is the stupidity of the body, and stupidity is the idleness of the mind.
If I read a book and it makes my whole body so cold no fire can ever warm me, I know that is poetry.
If I would be happy, I would be a bad ballplayer. With me, when I get mad, it puts energy in my body.
If I would be happy, I would be a very bad ball player. With me, when I get mad, it puts energy in my body.
In marriage do thou be wise; prefer the person before money; virtue before beauty; the mind before the body.
In moments of crisis one is never fighting against an external enemy but always against one's own body.
In the morning a man walks with his whole body; in the evening, only with his legs.
It is not I who become addicted, it is my body.
Life. A spiritual pickle preserving the body from decay.
Man consists of two parts, his mind and his body, only the body has more fun.
Man consists of two parts, his mind and his body, only the body has more fun.
Model. Two mobile eyes in a mobile head, itself on a mobile body.
Modesty is the conscience of the body.
My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it.
Nobody expects to trust his body overmuch after the age of fifty.
Our own physical body possesses a wisdom which we who inhabit the body lack. We give it orders which make no sense.
Pain of mind is worse than pain of body.
Premature development of the powers of both mind and body leads to an early grave.
Reading is to the mind what exercise is to the body.
Religion is organized to satisfy and guide the soul - politics does the same thing for the body.
Self-denial is the shining sore on the leprous body of Christianity.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
The best cure for hypochondria is to forget about your own body and get interested in someone else s.
The best cure for the body is a quiet mind.
The body is an instrument, the mind its function, the witness and reward of its operation.
The body is meant to be seen, not all covered up.
The body is mortal, but the person dwelling in the body is immortal and immeasurable.
The body of a sensualist is the coffin of a dead soul.
The brain may be regarded as a kind of parasite of the organism, a pensioner, as it were, who dwells with the body.
The chief function of the body is to carry the brain around
The chief function of the body is to carry the brain around.
The eye is the jewel of the body.
The eyes like sentinel occupy the highest place in the body.
The human mind treats a new idea the way the body treats a strange protein; it rejects it.
The ocean is a body of water occupying about two-thirds of a world made for man - who has no gills.
The pain of the mind is worse than the pain of the body.
The poet gives us his essence, but prose takes the mold of the body and mind.
The Senate is a body of old men charged with high duties and misdemeanors.
The soul, like the body, lives by what it feeds on.
There is an unseemly exposure of the mind, as well as of the body.
There is more wisdom in your body than in your deepest philosophy.
There is no part of the body which varies so much as the human ear.
There is peace more destructive of the manhood of living man than war is destructive of his material body.
To be no part of any body, is to be nothing.
True enjoyment comes from activity of the mind and exercise of the body; the two are ever united.
True silence is the rest of the mind; it is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
We are all cells in the same body of humanity.
We are that which activates the body.
We employ the mind to rule, the body to serve.
We find delight in the beauty and happiness of children that makes the heart too big for the body.
We must no more ask whether the soul and body are one than ask whether the wax and the figure impressed on it are one.
What is a epigram? A dwarfish whole. Its body brevity, and wit its soul.
What is an Epigram? A dwarfish whole its body brevity, and wit its soul.
When the belly is empty, the body becomes spirit; and when it is full, the spirit becomes body.
Work consists of whatever a body is obliged to do, and play consists of whatever a body is not obliged to do.
You beat your Pate, and fancy Wit will come: Knock as you please, there's no body at home.
You can chain me, you can torture me, you can even destroy this body, but you will never imprison my mind.
You can free yourself from aging by reinterpreting your body and by grasping the link between belief and biology.
You have to penetrate a woman's defenses. Getting into her head is a prerequisite to getting into her body.
You have to trust your body to take care of you.
You need to listen to your body because your body is listening to you.
You never know yourself till you know more than your body.
Your body is the church where Nature asks to be reverenced.
Your prayer must be for a sound mind in a sound body.
'Tis the mind that makes the body rich.
